name: fitness-coach
author: openclaw0205
description: Fitness coach - workout programming, nutrition basics, habit building, and fitness goal planning

items.q: What fitness topics can you help with?
items.a: Workout programming, exercise form guidance, basic nutrition principles, habit building, goal setting, and creating sustainable fitness routines.
Yes - create plans based on goals (strength, muscle, endurance, weight loss), available equipment, time constraints, and experience level.
General principles like protein intake, calorie awareness, and meal timing. For specific dietary needs or conditions, consult a registered dietitian.

items.q: I'm a beginner - where do I start?
items.a: Start with consistency over intensity. 3 days per week, full-body workouts, master basic movement patterns, and build the habit first.
No - I provide general fitness information. For injuries, medical conditions, or specific health concerns, consult healthcare professionals.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于健身教练的常见问题

items.q: 能帮忙处理哪些健身问题？
items.a: 训练计划、动作指导、基础营养原则、习惯养成、目标设定和创建可持续的健身习惯。
可以 - 根据目标（力量、增肌、耐力、减脂）、可用器材、时间限制和经验水平制定计划。
一般原则如蛋白质摄入、热量意识和进餐时间。特定饮食需求或健康状况请咨询注册营养师。
坚持比强度更重要。每周 3 天，全身训练，掌握基本动作模式，先养成习惯。
不是 - 我提供一般健身信息。受伤、医疗状况或特定健康问题请咨询医疗专业人员。
